snippet: The world’s largest shipping company says it is sending more containers around the world, a sign that global trade and possibly economic growth are picking up.
abstract: World's largest shipping company, A P Moller-Maersk, plans to send more containers around world in sign that global trade and economic growth may be on rise.
lead_paragraph: The world’s largest shipping company says it is sending more containers around the world, a sign that global trade and possibly economic growth are picking up.

headline.main: Profit, and Outlook, Soar for A.P. Moller-Maersk
headline.print_headline: Profit, and Outlook, Soar for A.P. Moller-Maersk
